actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the act which created the U.S. Olympic Committee to require such committee to hold public proceedings before it may alter its constitution, to require arbitration of certain amateur athletic disputes, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Requires the United States Olympic Committee to hold public proceedings before it may alter its constitution. Requires arbitration of specified amateur athletic disputes.

titles.title: A bill to amend the act which created the U.S. Olympic Committee to require such committee to hold public proceedings before it may alter its constitution, to require arbitration of certain amateur athletic disputes, and for other purposes.
